Package popt4jlib.GA

Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MutationOpIntf public interface for mutation operators.
XoverOpIntf public interface for cross-over operators.
 

Class Summary
DblArray1CMaker creates random double[] objects of fixed length, according to parameters passed in a HashMap object.
DblArray1GradDescXOverOp implements an experimental cross-over operator (that is quite time-consuming in practice) for chromosomes represented as double[] objects.
DblArray1GradientDescentMutationOp experimental mutation operator based on gradient descent ideas (similar to the ideas for DblArray1GradDescXOverOp.)
DblArray1HybridDescXOverOp yet another experimental hybrid x-over operator based on the concept of descent, operating on chromosomes represented as double[] objects.
DblArray1HybridMutationOp implements a hybrid mutation operator on double[] genes.
DblArray1PtXOverOp implements standard 1-point crossover over fixed-size arrays of doubles (double[] data structures).
DblArray1Vector1AlleleMutationOp Class implements the "standard" mutation operator for chromosomes represented as DblArray1Vector objects, of same or different length.
DblArray1Vector1PtXOverOp implements standard 1-point crossover over fixed-size DblArray1Vector objects.
DblArray1VectorCMaker creates random DblArray1Vector objects of fixed length, according to params passed in a HashMap object.
DblVarArray1AlleleMutationOp implements the "standard" mutation operator for chromosomes represented as double[] objects, of varying length.
DblVarArray1CMaker creates random double[] objects of varying length, according to parameters passed in a HashMap object.
DblVarArray1MAlleleMutationOp implements a multi-allele mutating operator, on chromosomes represented as variable-length double[] objects.
DblVarArray1PtXOverOp implements standard 1-point crossover over variable-size arrays of doubles (double[] data structures).
DGA The DGA class implements a thread-safe parallel Distributed Genetic Algorithm that follows the island-model of GA computation, with an elitist selection strategy that uses roulette-wheel selection of individuals based on their fitness (that is computed every generation).
IntVarArray1AlleleMutationOp Class implements the "standard" mutation operator for chromosomes represented as int[] objects, of varying length.
IntVarArray1CMaker creates random int[] objects of varying length, according to parameters passed in a HashMap object.
IntVarArray1PtXOverOp implements standard 1-point crossover over variable-size arrays of integers (int[] data structures).
IntVarArrayNPtXOverOp class implements the standard N-point crossover operator on chromosomes represented as int[] objects.
 

Package popt4jlib.GA Description

Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
